title: Give the gift of productivity with Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac or Windows for only $30!
content:
Macworld

It’s crunch time, and if your holiday shopping list is still longer than it should be with so few more days before Christmas, you need gift ideas that elicit smiles without requiring shipping time.

You can start by turning someone’s computer into an efficiency powerhouse with lifetime access to Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac or Windows, now priced at only $29.97 (reg. $229) through December 25.

Perfect for home users, students, and professionals alike, both licenses offer essential Microsoft productivity apps, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote. Mac licenses (4.5-star rated!) come with access to Teams Classic 2019, while Windows users get two additional apps: Publisher, for creating newsletters, flyers, and other documents, and Access, for managing large amounts of data.

This one-time purchase for your giftee eliminates the need to pay recurring fees or subscriptions to access productivity-enhancing programs, as with Microsoft 365, and this gift arrives instantly with easy download. No need to worry about MS Office arriving on time!

Mac users should have at least Monterey (version 12) or newer to install, while Windows users should have either Windows 10 or 11 as their OS.

Gift the most practical, last-minute holiday gift yet when you get Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac or Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows for just $29.97 through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon necessary!
